title: $2,500 Net - Brand New 1 Bedroom in Elevator Building
map_address: New York Ave near Church Ave
posting_body: ['Brand new luxury elevator building for no fee!', 'Featuring, large bedrooms, Washer/dryer in unit, Dishwasher, Balconies, Large Windows, Huge closets, Large living/dining room, and hardwood floors throughout the unit.', 'The Building is great for computers with the 2 & 5 trains just minutes away at Church avenue station, enjoy the building’s roof deck with breathtaking views of the city, and best of all the building has onsite parking.', 'Reach out today to schedule a viewing asap.', 'Central A/C', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Video Intercom', 'Elevator', 'Washer dryer installed', 'Private parking', 'Balcony', 'Roof access', 'Dishwasher', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Built in microwave', '$2,860 Gross Rent / $2,500 Net with 1.5 Months free', 'Text Leo at 212-470-8830 to schedule a viewing!', 'Thanks!', 'If you want to inquire about the apartment, send me a text with the following:', 'Name', 'Move in date', 'Income', 'Credit', 'Link to this apartment =)', 'I work for Nooklyn and can show you any apartment on their site.', 'No need to look for another agent =) Feel free to send me a text with:', 'Move in date:', 'Budget:', 'Bedrooms:', 'Amenities:', 'Areas:', 'Looking forward to hearing from you!', '=)']
